security: Sharing the identities of individuals connected to COSEC could potentially endanger those individuals.  Quoting directly: "A. DONALD EMERSON - NORTH AMERICAN SECRETARY COSSC B. RAUL AVILA - LATIN AMERICAN SECRETARY COSEC"
summary: A SECRET cable identifies Donald Emerson as the North American Secretary of COSSC and Raul Avila as the Latin American Secretary of COSEC.
summary_one_paragraph: On December 5, 1963, a SECRET cable was sent from the Director to PARIS/LOPEM and MEXICO CITY, identifying Donald Emerson as the North American Secretary of COSSC and Raul Avila as the Latin American Secretary of COSEC, with the reference DIR 87036.
title: Identities of Donald Emerson and Raul Avila
